trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListDataBindEventArgs"></xref> class.

trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListDataBindEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建一个新<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListDataBindEventArgs>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListDataBindEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The constructor initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListDataBindEventArgs.ListItem%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListDataBindEventArgs.DataItem%2A> properties with the values of `listItem` and `dataItem`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 构造函数初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListDataBindEventArgs.ListItem%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListDataBindEventArgs.DataItem%2A>具有的值的属性`listItem`和`dataItem`分别。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListDataBindEventArgs.DataItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListDataBindEventArgs.ListItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified data object of the list item that is being bound.
trans-unit.target: 获取要绑定的列表项指定的数据对象。

trans-unit.source: This property is available only on a request where the list item is data bound; on subsequent postbacks, it is always <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是仅在请求上可用的列表项所在数据绑定，则在后续回发，它始终是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。
此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: The specified data object for the list item that is being bound.
trans-unit.target: 要绑定的列表项指定的数据对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem"></xref> that is being bound.

trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。
